short_description: Ultra-Soft, Micro-Pointed Bristles Inspired by Surgeon’s Scrub Brush
Reaches Deep Into Tongue Crevices to Loosen Odor-Causing Bacteria
Built-In Scraper Effectively Removes Residue and Bacteria
Promotes a Cleaner Mouth and Long-Lasting Fresh Breath
Ideal for Daily Use; Replace Every 3–4 Months
product_description: Say goodbye to bad breath with the Orabrush Tongue Cleaner, designed with ultra-soft, micro-pointed bristles modeled after a surgeon’s scrub brush. These bristles gently reach deep into the uneven surface of your tongue, loosening odor-causing bacteria that typical brushing leaves behind. A built-in scraper follows up by effectively removing residue and bacteria, leaving your mouth feeling fresh and clean. Ideal for daily use and recommended to replace every 3–4 months, the Orabrush is your simple solution for long-lasting fresh breath.

product_description: DenTek Orabrush Fresh Breath Tongue Cleaner is a dual-action tongue cleaner featuring ultra-soft, micro-pointed bristles that reach into the deep crevices of the tongue to loosen stinky bacteria. The built-in tongue scraper then removes the bacteria helping to leave your breath fresh. Designed after a surgeon's scrub brush, Orabrush's micro-pointed bristles are designed specifically for the tongue since 90% of bad breath comes from a dirty tongue. Orabrush is the # 1 selling tongue cleaner.* To use the tongue scraper first wet Orabrush with water and extend the tongue. Brush back and forth several times, cleaning the entire surface. Reach the scraper toward the back of the tongue and gently scrap forward collecting gunk generated from brushing. Rinse the brush with warm water. For best results, replace tongue cleaner when you replace your toothbrush.Go beyond brushing with DenTek! Help preserve and protect your teeth for a lifetime with DenTek's innovative dental care products. *IRI MULO+C, L52 weeks ending 9/5/21.

name: GUM Tongue Cleaner - Dual Action Soft Bristled Tongue Brush with Tongue Scraper for Better Oral Hygiene - Bad Breath Treatment (Pack of 3)
short_description: GUM TONGUE CLEANER : Get fresher breath and a cleaner mouth. Our tongue scraper offers a gentle and effective way to remove dental plaque, food debris, and dead cells that cause bad breath and dental decay from the surface of the tongue.

FIGHT BAD BREATH : Clinical research shows that the tongue is one of the most common sources of bad breath (halitosis) and that regular tongue cleaning is a simple and effective bad breath treatment for adults and kids alike.
DUAL ActION : Our tongue cleaner features a dual action design with a double row tongue brush that dislodges food and plaque on one side and a tongue scraper that thoroughly cleans on the other.
ERGONOMIC DESIGN : Each of our tongue cleaners come with a narrow head that minimizes sensitivity and gag reflex and a long, comfort-grip handle for easy access to the back areas of the mouth.

HEALTHY STARTS HERE : Research continues to show the connection between oral health and overall health. The GUM brand is committed to providing innovative care products that make achieving optimum dental health accessible for everyone.
product_description: Product Description Get your freshest, cleanest mouth yet with the GUM Dual Action Tongue Cleaner. The GUM tongue cleaner offers a gentle and effective way to remove plaque and buildup from the surface of the tongue to reduce bad breath and improve overall oral health. The tongue is one of the most overlooked areas in the mouth when it comes to daily cleaning, yet clinical studies show that it's the main culprit in many cases of bad breath. Dental professionals recommend adding tongue cleaning to your daily routine. Our tongue cleaners feature a dual action design for a deeper, more effective clean. One side of the tongue cleaner consists of two rows of bristles that reach deep into the tiny folds and crevices on the tongue’s surface to dislodge dental plaque and food debris. The other side features a double row tongue scraper that removes the loosened particles for thorough cleaning. The GUM tongue scraper features a narrow head for minimal sensitivity and gag reflex, a long handle for easy access to the deep areas of the tongue, and an ergonomically designed comfort grip handle for precise maneuvering. Manufacturer Contact Information 1-888-777-3101
